MarketThemeDiscovery.CoreObjective: Find positive and negative market themes across full GICS hierarchy using professional and institutional reports sources for the stipulated dates.

Source.content: Weekly market outlook and sector analysis
Weekly research powered by proprietary data
Weekly investment lists and market reports

SubIndustryTechnologyPrecisionRequiremen.description: When detecting themes across any sector, drill down to specific sub-technologies and products (examples applicable to all GICS sectors)

PrecisionRule.Use: Nuclear power plant capacity expansion for AI data centers
NVIDIA H100/H200 GPU demand for AI data centers
AWS EC2 P5 instances for AI workloads
GLP-1 receptor agonists for obesity treatment

MultiSectorThemePatterns.Pattern: Themes affecting multiple GICS sectors with precise technology identification
Cross-industry supply chain relationships at component/product level
Regulatory changes impacting specific technologies/products across sectors
Technology adoption patterns across traditional industries
Economic cycles affecting specific sub-industry positioning

Process.Action: Aggregate financial news themes by industry category
Analyze news sentiment across major financial publications
Identify emerging themes and trend momentum
Review weekly research reports from major institutions
Analyze expert consensus and divergence signals
Cross-reference analyst themes with news trends
Label themes as positive/negative/neutral using -100 to +100 scale

GrowthOpportunities.description: Themes about US corporate expansion, innovation, and new opportunities

GameChangingInnovation.description: Themes about new technologies or business models

MarketExpansion.description: Themes about market growth or new market creation

EfficiencyGains.description: Themes about cost reduction or operational improvements

DisruptionThreats.description: Themes about competitive or technological threats

RegulatoryRisks.description: Themes about government or regulatory headwinds

CyclicalDownturns.description: Themes about sector or industry downturns

OperationalChallenges.description: Themes about execution or operational difficulties

Methodology.PrimaryApproach: AI topic modeling with financial language understanding for US corporate theme detection
Methodology.ValidationMethod: AI classifiers with positive/negative detection on -100 to +100 scale
Methodology.AttentionSystem: AI attention mechanisms + theme direction classification
Methodology.ScoringFramework: Normalized -100 to +100 scale with Â±22.5 trading thresholds
Methodology.FocusArea: US corporate themes only - excluding fiscal and monetary policy

Theme.Example: NVIDIA H100/H200 GPU supply constraints for AI data center workloads
Theme.KeyTechnology: Specific technology/product focus: H100/H200 GPU architecture, CUDA compute capability, HBM3 memory

KeySignals.Signal: Specific product/technology announcements, earnings impacts, market positioning
Supply chain specifics, pricing dynamics, market share data
Regulatory developments, competitive landscape changes
Developer communities, user adoption patterns, technical performance discussions
Industry professional forums discussing implementation challenges/successes

Theme.Example: GLP-1 receptor agonists market expansion and insurance coverage dynamics
Theme.KeyTechnology: Specific technology/product focus: GLP-1 receptor agonist mechanism, tirzepatide dual agonist, semaglutide formulation

KeySignals.Signal: Clinical trial results, FDA approvals, pricing announcements, insurance coverage decisions
Market access strategies, label expansions, manufacturing capacity
Competitive landscape analysis, market penetration data
Healthcare provider discussions, patient community feedback, insurance forums
Medical professional networks discussing efficacy and side effect profiles

Theme.Example: Enterprise AI workload migration to cloud infrastructure

Partnership announcements with enterprise software vendors, availability zones expansion
Market adoption metrics, competitive positioning updates
DevOps communities comparing performance/cost ratios, migration experiences
Cloud architecture forums discussing workload optimization and vendor considerations

Investment announcements, facility construction, supply chain partnerships

Early adopter communities, technical forums discussing advantages/limitations

Theme.TimeHorizon: Dynamically estimated based on signal strength and development cycles

Theme.Reason: Auto-detected specific reason for technology/product decline with market context

Theme.Reason: Auto-detected specific reason for technology/product decline with market context

Theme.Reason: Auto-detected specific reason for business model decline with regulatory context

Theme.Example: Bitcoin ETF institutional flows and fee structures driving institutional adoption patterns

Pension fund and endowment allocation announcements, advisor platform integrations
Regulatory developments, institutional custody solutions

Theme.Example: Play-to-earn gaming token economics sustainability challenges and player retention issues

Traditional game publisher statements against blockchain integration, regulatory scrutiny of token mechanics

Gaming communities expressing fatigue with token-based mechanics and unsustainable economics
Game developer forums discussing alternative monetization without cryptocurrency requirements

Theme.Reason: Auto-detected specific reason for gaming token decline with player behavior and economics

Shift.Reason: Real-time analysis of sentiment shift with market context
